thread.title: 'Isn't it wrong to date your mum?' Married couple on Jeremy Kyle Show look so alike viewers insist they MUST be related
thread.title_full: 'Isn't it wrong to date your mum?' Married couple on Jeremy Kyle Show look so alike viewers insist they MUST be related

author: Hayley Minn
title: 'Isn't it wrong to date your mum?' Married couple on Jeremy Kyle Show look so alike viewers insist they MUST be related
text:
TV 'Isn't it wrong to date your mum?' Married couple on Jeremy Kyle Show look so alike viewers insist they MUST be related Tim and his ex-wife Caren were fighting over their daughter - but viewers were far more interested in his likeness to his wife Michelle Share   Viewers mistake Jeremy Kyle guest's wife for his MUM Share this video Get celebs   
Jeremy Kyle Show viewers were absolutely STUNNED today, as a married couple looked and dressed the same. 
Tim and his ex-wife Caren were on the ITV show, fighting over their daughter Amber. 
Tim was insisting it was Caren’s fault he hadn’t been in Amber’s life for 19 years - but she was saying he hadn’t tried. 
His new wife Michelle - who he’s been married to for 18 years - then came on the show, and viewers were shocked at how much she looked like Tim, to the point they were in the same outfit. 
Many even insisted they must be related in some way. Read More Jeremy Kyle viewers insisted Tim and Michelle must be related (Photo: ITV) Tim was brought on the show by his ex-wife Caren (Photo: ITV) But viewers were more interested in his likeness to his wife (Photo: ITV) 
One said: “Is that his wife? i thought it was his mum lol #jeremykyle.” 
Another added: ”F**king hell, she looks like his sister/mother #jeremykyle.” 
A third agreed: “His new wife is also his stunt double #jeremykyle.” 
While a fourth shared: “I know Michelle is new partner but isn't it wrong to date your mum?” Is Tim dating his mum? (Photo: ITV) He hadn't seen his daughter in 19 years (Photo: ITV) Caren wasn't happy with her ex-husband (Photo: ITV) 
Jeremy eventually made Michelle and Caren get off the stage for Amber and Tim to sort out their issues between them. 
Amber said she wanted her dad to "make an effort”. Read More Jeremy was shocked (Photo: ITV) Caren ended up coming across better (Photo: ITV) Amber may get her dad back (Photo: ITV) But she's coming back on the show soon (Photo: ITV) 
She added: “I want him to step up and be my dad, and see me every other week, like the court order said originally.” 
Tim agreed a good dad should “take care of their child and give the child what they want.” 
The Jeremy Kyle Show’s Twitter account revealed all four will “make an explosive return to the show in an upcoming episode”. 
*The Jeremy Kyle Show continues on ITV1 weekdays at 9.25am Like us on Facebook
